seller.description: The owner or the owners substitute (for example a broker).

contactPerson.title: Person
contactPerson.description: Contact person for questions and typically responsible for making appointments. This contact is typicaly presented publicly.

inquiryPerson.title: Person
inquiryPerson.description: The person responsible for receiving inquiries and applications. This person should not be presented publicly and is only intended as an indirect recipient using an online form or similar.

characteristics.description: Characteristics and ranges relevant to entire project.

localizations.description: Sequence of all language specific content and texts.

items.description: One for each language, a set of language specific content and texts.

excerpt.description: A short extract from description, location and equipment.

attachments.description: Sequence links, files, embeds and media.
attachments.title: ProjectAttachment

items.description: Specifications, brochures and other descriptive files.
A document given to political officials (commune) with basic information portraying the property and its registrational validity.

'direct-link' defines a link that will link visitors 'directly' to the offer. For example from a List of properties one will be linked to the project website directly if clicked. This is usually used by websites, and portals tend to ignore that and can opt into simply representing them as normal 'link' types.
Virtual tour link, typically used for embeddings and integrations.
Video link, typically used for embeddings and integrations.

localizations.description: Sequence of all language specific content and texts.

items.description: One for each language, a set of language specific content and texts.

id.description: This ID needs to be unique and represents the id from the exporter (this can be the same as referenceId if the exporter is the original creator)

referenceId.description: Can be used to track the original creation id (this should usually be unique to the property)

unitReferenceId.description: Reference to an existing project - unit within the xml. Used for grouping and representing a 'project-tree'

visualReferenceId.description: Can should only be used for presentational purposes publishers tend to present the referenceId if this one is missing

utilizations.description: Prioritized sequence for the intended utilization of the property, main comes first.

minergieCertification.description: Quality label for new and refurbished low-energy-consumption buildings.

modified.description: Date and time of the last modification. This field should only be used for presentational purposes and should not be relied upon for import cache-busting.

created.description: Creation date and time of the data.

parcelNumbers.description: Arbitrary string that holds one or more parcel numbers, either from the swiss cadastral system or from a certain municipality.

author.description: The name or username of the author, who created the record.

buildingZones.description: Building zones intended for residential buildings or for other buildings intended as long-stay accommodation, those are typically municipal-specific abbreviations.

development.description: The development state of the property.

contactPerson.title: Person
contactPerson.description: Contact person for questions and typically responsible for making appointments. This contact is typicaly presented publicly.

visitPerson.title: Person
visitPerson.description: Person responsible opening the door for visiting.

inquiryPerson.title: Person
inquiryPerson.description: The person responsible for receiving inquiries and applications. This person should not be presented publicly and is only intended as an indirect recipient using an online form or similar.

localizations.title: PropertyLocalization
localizations.description: Sequence of all language specific content and texts.

languageCodeType.description: Lowercase, two letter representation of a language.

priceIntervalType.description: The payment interval, the price stands for.

priceReferringType.description: For what area the price stands for.

emailType.description: Very loose email like strings, validation basically just checks, if there is an @ sign and a dot after that.

phoneNumberType.description: Strings of at least three digits, may start with a plus sign and can have single spaces between digits, leading and trailing whitespace are not allowed.

attachmentImageType.description: Picture from inside or outside, typically used in image galleries.

egid.description: The building identifier of the swiss population register

ewid.description: The flat identifier of the swiss population register

egrid.description: The property (plot) identifier of the swiss population register

distribution.title: HeatingDistribution
distribution.description: How the heating system distributes and maintains temperature.

propertyCharacteristicsType.description: The cold facts, to represent the property or offer.

areaCellar.description: Space allocated in cellar included within the offer in m²

areaBalcony.description: If there is a balcony (non ground floor outside area) this field would specify the area in m²

areaTerrace.description: Usually ground floor outside seating area in m²

areaLoggia.description: Usually refers to a covered not necessarily heated area with fresh air, but not opened up to the outside.

areaGarden.description: Area dedicated to growing plants or a garden. To differentiate from something like a Terrace. In m²

arePetsAllowed.title: applicableType
arePetsAllowed.description: Pets are allowed or not tolerated.

ceilingHeight.description: Height of the rooms in m.

craneCapacity.description: Carrying capacity for crane in kg.

floor.description: Floor number, ground floor is 0, basement floors are negative.

grossPremium.description: A gross premium is the total premium of an insurance contract before brokerage or discounts have been deducted, in percent.

hallHeight.description: Hall height in m, usually for commercial properties.

hasBuildingLawRestrictions.description: Restrictions for modifications apply, like monument protection and similar.
hasBuildingLawRestrictions.title: applicableType

hasCarPort.description: A covered structure used to offer limited protection from rain and snow, for one car.
hasCarPort.title: applicableType

hasCarPortDouble.description: A covered structure used to offer limited protection from rain and snow, for two cars.
hasCarPortDouble.title: applicableType

hasChargingStation.description: Whether or not a charging station for e-Cars is provided.
hasChargingStation.title: applicableType

hasConnectedBuildingLand.description: States if the land is fully developed and ready being built on it.
hasConnectedBuildingLand.title: applicableType

hasDemolitionProperty.description: Used for building land, states if there is some demolition property on it (or pieces of it).
hasDemolitionProperty.title: applicableType

hasFireplace.description: Includes a framed opening to hold an open fire, indoors.
hasFireplace.title: applicableType

hasFlatSharingCommunity.title: applicableType
hasFlatSharingCommunity.description: Whether or not there is a residential community, sharing the living space.

hasForeignQuota.title: applicableType
hasForeignQuota.description: Widely used to control the amount of foreigners buying holiday flats in popular regions.

hasGardenShed.title: applicableType
hasGardenShed.description: A small building for storing garden tools, bicycles, and other equipment.

hasLiftingPlatform.title: applicableType
hasLiftingPlatform.description: Provides vertical transportation between building floors, levels or decks, and are commonly found in offices, public buildings and other types of multi-story accommodation.

hasNiceView.title: applicableType
hasNiceView.description: Has a lovely view, usually from the balcony or the living room.

hasParking.title: applicableType
hasParking.description: An uncovered space for one car or more cars.

hasPhotovoltaic.title: applicableType
hasPhotovoltaic.description: Whether or not a photovoltaic system is provided.

hasPlayground.title: applicableType
hasPlayground.description: Has a playground for children nearby.

hasRamp.title: applicableType
hasRamp.description: A sloping floor, walk, or roadway leading from one level to another, usually to make a place accessible for wheels.

hasSupplyGas.title: applicableType
hasSupplyGas.description: Availability of a gas connection, usually for heating and cooking.

hasSupplyPower.title: applicableType
hasSupplyPower.description: A connection to the public electric grid.

hasSupplySewage.title: applicableType
hasSupplySewage.description: A connection to the public waste water system.

hasSupplyWater.title: applicableType
hasSupplyWater.description: A connection to the public water supply.

hasThermalSolarCollector.title: applicableType
hasThermalSolarCollector.description: Whether or not a thermal solar collector system is provided.

hasTiledStove.title: applicableType
hasTiledStove.description: A masonry heater or ceramic stove, is a device for warming an interior space usually fed with wood.

hasTumbleDryer.title: applicableType
hasTumbleDryer.description: Dryer for clothes after washing them.

hasWashingMachine.title: applicableType
hasWashingMachine.description: For washing clothes and other cloth.

hasRemoteViewings.title: applicableType
hasRemoteViewings.description: Indicates that prospects can visit the property virtually (e.g. with a video-call or guided virtual-tour hosted by the real estate agent)

isCornerHouse.title: applicableType
isCornerHouse.description: A house situated on the corner of two streets.

isDemolitionProperty.title: applicableType
isDemolitionProperty.description: If it's a tear-down property or a site of demolished structures.

isDilapidated.title: applicableType
isDilapidated.description: Old and in poor condition, in a state of decay.

isFirstOccupancy.title: applicableType
isFirstOccupancy.description: No one used the flat or the building before, since it was built or heavily renovated from ground up.

isGroundFloor.title: applicableType
isGroundFloor.description: Nearly on a level with the ground.

isGroundFloorRaised.title: applicableType
isGroundFloorRaised.description: Half of a stair elevated story, in a building.

isGutted.title: applicableType
isGutted.description: Preparation for demolition or a part-demolition, all contaminants, doors, windows, floors and non-load bearing walls were removed.

isInNeedOfRenovation.title: applicableType
isInNeedOfRenovation.description: Needs to be renewed in order to be fully usable again.

isInNeedOfRenovationPartially.title: applicableType
isInNeedOfRenovationPartially.description: Needs to be renewed partially in order to be fully usable again.

isLikeNew.title: applicableType
isLikeNew.description: Used, but as good as new.

isMiddleHouse.title: applicableType
isMiddleHouse.description: Situated between two other houses or buildings.

isModernized.title: applicableType
isModernized.description: Modernized means improved, things like a better insulated roof and walls, modern heating system and similar improvements.

isOldBuilding.title: applicableType
isOldBuilding.description: Refers to the construction method used until 60-80 years ago.

isQuiet.title: applicableType
isQuiet.description: Part of a quiet surrounding or neighbourhood.

isRefurbished.title: applicableType
isRefurbished.description: Fully renovated, neat, clean and restored.

isSecondaryResidenceAllowed.title: applicableType
isSecondaryResidenceAllowed.description: Where a person lives part time or less than the majority of the calendar year, typically a holiday flat, some laws and landlords do not allow this.

isShellConstruction.title: applicableType
isShellConstruction.description: Intentionally missing interior finish in order to allow customization.

isSunny.title: applicableType
isSunny.description: Sunny surroundings, nor trees, mountains or other buildings do shadow.

isWheelchairAccessible.title: applicableType
isWheelchairAccessible.description: All aspects are accessible for wheelchair users.

numberOfToiletsGuest.description: The number of guest and additional toilets

onHillsideSouth.title: applicableType
onHillsideSouth.description: Built on a sloping hillside towards the south.

utilizationRatio.description: Plot area built on, the ratio between plot area and gross floor area.

utilizationRatioConstruction.description: Plot area to be built on, the ratio between plot area and gross floor area.

volumeSia116Gv.description: olume SIA in m³ – Older Standard (SIA 116) with the Abbreviation 'GV'. This is still in use specifically for legacy properties.

yearBuilt.description: Year of construction, in four digits.

yearLastRenovated.description: Year of last renovation, in four digits.

pricesType.description: Sell, rent, deposit and auction prices.

wirPercentage.description: The percentage of the gross price which has to paid in WIR Franc electronic currency.

emailRem.description: This field is depricated and will be removed in a future major version!

applicableType.description: Applicable can have three states, unknown must be treated as default.

options.description: List of publisher specific custom fields
options.title: PublisherOption

publisherOptionType.description: Custom key-value pair, or generic data field, used for non-standardized data transaction, between two entities.

localizationType.description: One for each language, a set of language specific content and texts.

excerpt.description: A short extract from description, location and equipment.

location.description: Description of the surrounding and location.

equipment.description: Description of available and included equipment.

attachments.title: PropertyAttachment
attachments.description: Sequence links, files, embeds and media.

items.description: Specifications, brochures and other descriptive files.
A document given to political officials (commune) with basic information portraying the property and its registrational validity.

'direct-link' defines a link that will link visitors 'directly' to the offer. For example from a List of properties one will be linked to the project website directly if clicked. This is usually used by websites, and portals tend to ignore that and can opt into simply representing them as normal 'link' types.
Virtual tour link, typically used for embeddings and integrations.
Video link, typically used for embeddings and integrations.

visitInformation.description: Specific visiting instructions or information, where to get the key, when to contact and similar.

websiteType.description: Sellers URL, typically the company website.

unitCharacteristicsType.description: The cold facts, to represent a unit.
